type.name: T:Elysium.Notifications.VerticalPlacement
type.summary: Defines, by which side of the screen notifications are aligned.

field.name: F:Elysium.Notifications.VerticalPlacement.Top
field.summary: Notifications are aligned by the top side of the screen.

field.name: F:Elysium.Notifications.VerticalPlacement.Bottom
field.summary: Notifications are aligned by the bottom side of the screen.
